amendment.description: To direct the Defense Department to assess the impacts on the military family housing program if the family housing privatization limitation is not eliminated.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3660 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3660 proposed by Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S9242; text: CR S9242) To direct the Defense Department to assess the impacts on the military family housing program if the family housing privatization limitation is not eliminated.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3660 proposed by Senator Hutchison.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3660 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
